A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is maybe the worst movie i have ever seen. Not visually\, but the way it goes out of it's way to destroy and humiliate everything that was once Star Wars. They left the franchise with nothing because Disney wanted to show the world that Lucas legacy means NOTHING to them\, and that this is theirs now.\n\nDo not see this\, do not ever support Disney again.
